entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The problem is, mr. trump, WE ARE NOT RECOVERING FROM THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC. Putting American workers first requires testing, a robust tracing plan and continued federal leadership on social distancing/facemasks/etc. NONE OF THIS IS HAPPENING UNDER TRUMP’S FAILED LEADERSHIP. Sad.
